network.networkUsedFor: What Is Your Virtual Network Used For?
network.name: Name
network.addCloudGatewayTips: Add a Cloud gateway to your network to aggregation data and forwarding data form sites.
network.addEdgeTips: Add routers that need to join the network as Edges that can forward data via the gateway.
network.unavailableTips: The Current Device Has Been Selected As The Local Gateway.
network.addALocalGatewayTips: Add a local Gateway with a public IP for forwarding data.
network.cloudForwardingDesc: Prioritize the use of cloud gateways to guarantee reachability, which results in a stable network.
network.localForwardingDesc: Prioritize local gateways for accessibility, which reduces your data usage costs.
network.paymentMethodDesc: You have selected the Cloud Gateway services, please pay the required fee before deployment.
network.realTimeDataTips: Includes only the device's data through the Gateway; the data may deviate from the billing data.
network.dataUsedUpTips: If the amount of data for this month has been used up, the cloud gateway will be automatically disabled until the 1st of the following month.To continue using it, please
network.createCloudTips: These settings cannot be modified after the node are created.
network.startingPointCannotBeACloudNode: The starting point cannot be a cloud node
network.onlyOneCloudGateway: Only one cloud gateway can be added
network.maxNum64: The maximum number of selections is 64
